text: monitor this 13 step expiration and see if we start expanding above 100,000 pretty quickly because then that tells me that yeah there's people not only rolling over into the next front expiration but also trying to play earnings so I am very interested to see how that goes the way I'm looking at markets right now is taking varanis premium opportunities as they emerge I'm tentatively looking to Trend follow the indices with Futures but very very light right now because they are not trending and I'm looking for directional plays using things like ratioc called diagonals and stuff like that because there are a lot of opportunities to find strength it's just in smaller groupings right now so it takes a little more research to come across those and the portfolio but the one thing I can say is this is not a place where I'm looking to use and deploy a ton of capital because I do not like when the market is hanging out near all-time highs and starting to stall I never like that that again does not mean that we crash but it means I don't want to top tick start getting long at the very top before we have some sort of pullback because then again there's an opportunity to cost to that Capital so name of the game agile fast on the feet even though you boy a herniated disc I'm not really fast at all maybe my thumb will be super
